# Changelog

## v0.3 2024-11-06

- Improved local test setup,
- Index files are consistently recognized in subfolders.
- Pygments as a dependency is now optional.

## v0.2 2024-11-05

- Added syntax highlighting for fenced code blocks.
- Added Pygments as a dependency.

## v0.1 2024-11-05

- Initial version.
